name: LightWave 3D License Key File
summary: An LWK file is a license key used by NewTek LightWave 3D, a professional 3D rendering application. It stores a unique string of characters tied to a user's purchase, enabling the user to activate a legal copy of the software. NewTek introduced the LWK file type when it released version 11 of LightWave 3D, replacing .KEY files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
